'''Oil Meets Fire''' is [[Xiangling]]'s [[Level 2 Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Although [[pets]] and [[Serenitea Pot]] [[animal]]s cannot take damage, they can be briefly set on fire with this Constellation, unlike other sources of Pyro.
